option.name: replacementList
option.value: reg DISPLAY_NETNAME; always@(posedge aclk) DISPLAY_NETNAME <= pc_status[ERR_BIT];

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_AUXM_ADDR_WIDTH. Parameter ADDR_WIDTH must be between 32 and 64 bits inclusive"

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI4LITE_AUXM_DATA_WIDTH. Parameter DATA_WIDTH must be either 32 or 64."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_AUXM_DATA_WIDTH. Parameter DATA_WIDTH must be 32, 64, 128, 256, 512 or 1024"

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_AUXM_EXCL_OVERFLOW. Exclusive access monitor overflow, increase EXMON_WIDTH parameter."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_AUXM_EXMON_WIDTH. Parameter EXMON_WIDTH must be greater than or equal to 1"

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_AUXM_MAXRBURSTS. Parameter MAXRBURSTS must be greater than or equal to 1"

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_AUXM_MAXWBURSTS. Parameter MAXWBURSTS must be greater than or equal to 1"

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_AUXM_RCAM_OVERFLOW. Read CAM overflow, increase Maximum outstanding READ Transactions per ID (MAX_RD_BURSTS) parameter."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_AUXM_RCAM_UNDERFLOW. Read CAM underflow."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_AUXM_WCAM_OVERFLOW. Write CAM overflow, increase Maximum outstanding WRITE Transactions per ID (MAX_WR_BURSTS) parameter."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_AUXM_WCAM_UNDERFLOW. Write CAM underflow"

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRL_CACTIVE_X: When not in reset, a value of X on CACTIVE is not permitted. Spec: section A9.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRL_CSYSACK_FALL: When CSYSACK transitions from high to low, CSYSREQ must be low. Spec: figure A9-1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRL_CSYSACK_RISE: When CSYSACK transitions from low to high, CSYSREQ must be high. Spec: figure A9-1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRL_CSYSACK_X: When not in reset, a value of X on CSYSACK is not permitted. Spec: section A9.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRL_CSYSREQ_FALL: When CSYSREQ transitions from high to low, CSYSACK must be high. Spec: figure A9-1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRL_CSYSREQ_RISE: When CSYSREQ transitions from low to high, CSYSACK must be low. Spec: figure A9-1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRL_CSYSREQ_X: When not in reset, a value of X on CSYSREQ is not permitted. Spec: section A9.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARADDR_BOUNDARY: A burst must not cross a 4kbyte boundary. Spec: section A3.4.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARADDR_STABLE: ARADDR must remain stable when ARVALID is asserted and ARREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARADDR_WRAP_ALIGN: For a wrapping burst, the start address must be aligned to the size of each transfer. Spec: section A3.4.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARADDR_X: When ARVALID is high, a value of X on ARADDR is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARBURST: When ARVALID is high, a value of 2'b11 on ARBURST is not permitted. Spec: table A3-3."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARBURST_STABLE: ARBURST must remain stable when ARVALID is asserted and ARREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARBURST_X: When ARVALID is high, a value of X on ARBURST is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARCACHE: When AWVALID is high, a reserved value on ARCACHE is not allowed. Spec: table A4-5."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARCACHE_STABLE: ARCACHE must remain stable when ARVALID is asserted and ARREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARCACHE_X: When ARVALID is high, a value of X on ARCACHE is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARID_X: When ARVALID is high, a value of X on ARID is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARLEN_FIXED: Transactions of burst type FIXED cannot have a length greater than 16 beats. Spec: section A3.4.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARLEN_LOCK: Exclusive access transactions cannot have a length greater than 16 beats. Spec: section A7.2.4."

option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARLEN_STABLE: ARLEN must remain stable when ARVALID is asserted and ARREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARLEN_WRAP: For a wrapping burst, the length of the burst must be 2, 4, 8 or 16 transfers. Spec: section A3.4.1."

option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARLEN_X: When ARVALID is high, a value of X on ARLEN is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARVALID_RESET: The earliest point after reset that a master is permitted to begin driving ARVALID, AWVALID, or WVALID HIGH is at a rising ACLK edge after ARESETn is HIGH. Spec: Figure A3-1."

option.value: "AXI_ERRM_ARVALID_X: When not in reset, a value of X on ARVALID is not permitted. Spec: section A3.1.2."

option.value: "AXI_ERRM_AWVALID_RESET: The earliest point after reset that a master is permitted to begin driving ARVALID, AWVALID, or WVALID HIGH is at a rising ACLK edge after ARESETn is HIGH. Spec: Figure A3-1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_AWVALID_STABLE: Once AWVALID is asserted, it must remain asserted until AWREADY is high. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_AWVALID_X: When not in reset, a value of X on AWVALID is not permitted. Spec: section A3.1.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_BREADY_X: When not in reset, a value of X on BREADY is not permitted. Spec: section A3.1.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_EXCL_ALIGN: The address of an exclusive access must be aligned to the total number of bytes in the transaction. Spec: section A7.2.4."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_EXCL_LEN: The number of bytes to be transferred in an exclusive access burst must be a power of 2. Spec: section A7.2.4."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_EXCL_MAX: The maximum number of bytes that can be transferred in an exclusive burst is 128. Spec: section A7.2.4."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_RREADY_X: When not in reset, a value of X on RREADY is not permitted. Spec: section A3.1.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WDATA_NUM: The number of write data items must match AWLEN for the corresponding address. Spec: section A3.4.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WDATA_STABLE: WDATA must remain stable when WVALID is asserted and WREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WDATA_X: When WVALID is high, a value of X on active byte lanes of WDATA is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WLAST_STABLE: WLAST must remain stable when WVALID is asserted and WREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WLAST_X: When WVALID is high, a value of X on WLAST is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WSTRB: Write strobes must only be asserted for the correct byte lanes as determined from start address, transfer size and beat number. Spec: section A3.4.3."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WSTRB_STABLE: WSTRB must remain stable when WVALID is asserted and WREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WSTRB_X: When WVALID is high, a value of X on WSTRB is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WUSER_STABLE: WUSER must remain stable when WVALID is asserted and WREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WUSER_TIEOFF: WUSER must be stable when WUSER_WIDTH is set to 0."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WUSER_X: When WVALID is high, a value of X on WUSER is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WVALID_RESET: The earliest point after reset that a master is permitted to begin driving ARVALID, AWVALID, or WVALID HIGH is at a rising ACLK edge after ARESETn is HIGH. Spec: Figure A3-1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WVALID_STABLE: Once WVALID is asserted, it must remain asserted until WREADY is high. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRM_WVALID_X: When not in reset, a value of X on WVALID is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_ARREADY_X: When not in reset, a value of X on ARREADY is not permitted. Spec: section A3.1.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_AWREADY_X: When not in reset, a value of X on AWREADY is not permitted. Spec: section A3.1.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI4LITE_ERRS_BRESP_EXOKAY: A slave must not give an EXOKAY response on an Axi4Lite interface. Spec: section B1.1.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI4LITE_ERRS_RRESP_EXOKAY: A slave must not give an EXOKAY response on an Axi4Lite interface. Spec: section B1.1.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BID_STABLE: BID must remain stable when BVALID is asserted and BREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BID_TIEOFF: BID must be stable when ID_WIDTH is set to 0."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BID_X: When BVALID is high, a value of X on BID is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BRESP_ALL_DONE_EOS: All write transaction addresses must have been matched with corresponding write response."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BRESP_AW: A slave must not give a write response before the write address. Spec: section A3.3.1 and figure A3-7."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BRESP_EXOKAY: An EXOKAY write response can only be given to an exclusive write access. Spec: section A7.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BRESP_STABLE: BRESP must remain stable when BVALID is asserted and BREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BRESP_WLAST: A slave must only give a write response after the last write data item is transferred. Spec: section A3.3.1 and figure A3-7."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BRESP_X: When BVALID is high, a value of X on BRESP is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BUSER_STABLE: BUSER must remain stable when BVALID is asserted and BREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BUSER_TIEOFF: BUSER must be stable when BUSER_WIDTH is set to 0."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BUSER_X: When BVALID is high, a value of X on BUSER is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BVALID_RESET: The earliest point after reset that a master is permitted to begin driving ARVALID, AWVALID, or WVALID HIGH is at a rising ACLK edge after ARESETn is HIGH. Spec: Figure A3-1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BVALID_STABLE: Once BVALID is asserted, it must remain asserted until BREADY is high. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_BVALID_X: When not in reset, a value of X on BVALID is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RDATA_NUM: The number of read data items must match the corresponding ARLEN. Spec: section A3.4.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RDATA_STABLE: RDATA must remain stable when RVALID is asserted and RREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RDATA_X: When RVALID is high, a value of X on RDATA valid byte lanes is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RID: A slave can only give read data with an ID to match an outstanding read transaction. Spec: section A5.3.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RID_STABLE: RID must remain stable when RVALID is asserted and RREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RID_TIEOFF: RID must be stable when ID_WIDTH is set to 0."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RID_X: When RVALID is high, a value of X on RID is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RLAST_ALL_DONE_EOS: All outstanding read bursts must have completed a the end of the simulation."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RLAST_STABLE: RLAST must remain stable when RVALID is asserted and RREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RLAST_X: When RVALID is high, a value of X on RLAST is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RRESP_EXOKAY: An EXOKAY read response can only be given to an exclusive read access. Spec: section A7.2.3."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RRESP_STABLE: RRESP must remain stable when RVALID is asserted and RREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RRESP_X: When RVALID is high, a value of X on RRESP is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RUSER_STABLE: RUSER must remain stable when RVALID is asserted and RREADY low. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RUSER_TIEOFF: RUSER must be stable when RUSER_WIDTH is set to 0."

option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RUSER_X: When RVALID is high, a value of X on RUSER is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RVALID_RESET: The earliest point after reset that a master is permitted to begin driving ARVALID, AWVALID, or WVALID HIGH is at a rising ACLK edge after ARESETn is HIGH. Spec: Figure A3-1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RVALID_STABLE: Once RVALID is asserted, it must remain asserted until RREADY is high. Spec: section A3.2.1."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_RVALID_X: When not in reset, a value of X on RVALID is not permitted. Spec: section A3.1.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_ERRS_WREADY_X: When not in reset, a value of X on WREADY is not permitted. Spec: section A3.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_RECM_BREADY_MAX_WAIT: BREADY should be asserted within MAXWAITS cycles of BVALID being asserted."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_RECM_EXCL_MATCH: The address payload of an exclusive write should be the same as the preceding exclusive read with the same ID. Spec: section A7.2.4."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_RECM_EXCL_PAIR: An exclusive write should have an earlier outstanding completed exclusive read with the same ID. Spec: section A7.2.2."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_RECM_RREADY_MAX_WAIT. RREADY should be asserted within MAXWAITS cycles of RVALID being asserted."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_RECS_ARREADY_MAX_WAIT. ARREADY should be asserted within MAXWAITS cycles of ARVALID being asserted."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_RECS_AWREADY_MAX_WAIT. AWREADY should be asserted within MAXWAITS cycles of AWVALID being asserted."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "AXI_RECS_WREADY_MAX_WAIT. WREADY should be asserted within MAXWAITS cycles of WVALID being asserted."

option.name: replacementList
replacementList
replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_ARESETN_PULSE_WIDTH. ARESETn must be low for atleast 16 ACLKn cycles."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_ARREADY_RESET. ARREADY must be low for the first clock edge that ARESETn goes high."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_AR_MAX_BURST. AR MASTER has issued a burst longer than the declared MAXIMUM."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_AR_SUPPORTS_NARROW_BURST. AR Narrow burst issued from MASTER. Connection has been declared to NOT support narrow bursts."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_AR_SUPPORTS_NARROW_CACHE. AR Non-modifiable burst issued from MASTER. Connection has been declared to NOT support narrow bursts."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_AWREADY_RESET. AWREADY must be low for the first clock edge that ARESETn goes high."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_AW_MAX_BURST. AW MASTER has issued a burst longer than the declared MAXIMUM."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_AW_SUPPORTS_NARROW_BURST. AW Narrow burst issued from MASTER. Connection has been declared to NOT support narrow bursts."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_AW_SUPPORTS_NARROW_CACHE. AW Non-modifiable burst issued from MASTER. Connection has been declared to NOT support narrow bursts."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_AXI4_ERRM_NO_STRB_ADDRESS. When there is no WSTRB, address must be aligned with data width"

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_AXI4_ERRM_SUPPORTS_NARROW_BURST_SIZE. When there is support narrow burst along with WSTRB, then AWSIZE has to be greater than or equal to data width"

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_BREADY_RESET. BREADY must be low for the first clock edge that ARESETn goes high."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "Detected Read DECERR"

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "Detected Read SLVERR"

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_RECM_CONTINUOUS_WTRANSFERS_MAX_WAIT. WVALID should be asserted within MAXWAITS cycles of either AW command transfer or previous W transfer while there are outstanding AW commands."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_RECM_WLAST_TO_AWVALID_MAX_WAIT. AWVALID should be asserted within MAXWAITS cycles of WLAST transfer or previous AW transfer if there are yet more WLAST transfers outstanding."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_RECS_CONTINUOUS_RTRANSFERS_MAX_WAIT. RVALID should be asserted within MAXWAITS cycles of either AR command transfer or previous R transfer while there are outstanding AR commands."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_RECS_WRITE_TO_BVALID_MAX_WAIT. BVALID should be asserted within MAXWAITS cycles of AW command transfer or WLAST transfer (whichever is later), or previous B transfer if there are yet more AW and WLAST transfers outstanding."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_RREADY_RESET. RREADY must be low for the first clock edge that ARESETn goes high."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "XILINX_WREADY_RESET. WREADY must be low for the first clock edge that ARESETn goes high."

option.name: replacementList
option.value: "Detected Write DECERR"
